description: Fun tour in Chiayi at your fingertips with the smart traveling platform
Scenario: Kim, a South Korean tourist decided to arrange a trip to Taiwan for Christmas after watching a TV show introducing Taiwan. He has decided to go to Chiayi and is in need of more tourist info.
pain_points_and_needs: •	 Travelers are not familiar with Chiayi
•	 Some travel information is out of date
smart_solution: This solution involves multi-service platform combining mobile payment with online-offline (O2O) integration to provide more convenience for tourists. It is built on an interactive kiosk to sell products with local features, and provide tourists with information of restaurants, ticketing, tours, souvenir shops, transportation, local culture and attractions. It also provides multi-payment service for tourists, so that they could purchase anything at any time with their own currency. The platform service is also available in Chinese, English, Japanese, Korean and more ensure the ease of use for foreign tourists.
adopted_technology: AI voice interaction, virtual tour, big data analytics
benefits: •	 Interactive kiosks to provide tourists with info on Chiayi
solution_description: This solution involves multi-service platform combining mobile payment with online-offline (O2O) integration to provide more convenience for tourists.
